entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 11:14 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.4°C
Wind: WNW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
